summary: Koschei
title: Koschei
body:
“It was beautiful. Like nothing I’ve ever seen before. It was like an everlasting sunset on a plane of nothingness.” - Ava Collins

Pulvis et umbra sumus

I sit silently by myself on the quinjet. I’m trying to think about all the different ways this is going to go down. I like to act tough, but I’m scared shitless. I am sweating and pale and I’m…

Read more…

summary: Black Widow Gets a Solo Movie: Directed by Cate Shortland
title: Black Widow Gets a Solo Movie: Directed by Cate Shortland
body:
Black Widow Gets a Solo Movie: Directed by Cate Shortland

Variety reports that Cate Shortland (director of Berlin Syndrome (2017), Lore (2012)– both female-led films) is set to direct a stand alone ‘Black Widow’ film starring Scarlett Johansson. Though Marvel has not officially responded to the report, the reports seem to be true. The film is expected to narrate the origin story and her days in the Red Room. The film may finally tell us what happened at…

View On WordPress

summary: Steve Rogers is literally just an sjw art kid who took a bunch of drugs and then did some theater work before joining an...
body: Steve Rogers is literally just an sjw art kid who took a bunch of drugs and then did some theater work before joining an antifascist movement, and anyone who went to an art school knows 10 different people who fit that description, but his drugs were from the government so instead of calling him a “leftist crybaby, blue-haired gender studies major” like the rest of us, fuck boys call him a “superhero” and “patriotic” and bitch I still wanna know where that line’s drawn.

blog.name: claw-kraai
blog.title: Claw Kraai
blog.description: K, if you're reading this you're probably interested in learning more about me and this blog. Name's Claw, I rule this little corner of tumblr. I don't care too much about pronouns but prefer she/her or they/them, use whichever catches your fancy. As for this blog, weeeell… A Hot Mess is my best description for it. I basically scavenge and salvage whatever I like best from other blogs and use a chaotic tagging system mostly for myself. If you like neat tags, this is not the place to be. I write occasional stories and like to make art 'n stuff but that's about it. Whelp, enjoy.

summary: Peter Parker, a Gen Z kid, screws up: Fuck, guess I'll kill myself. Steve Rogers, an artist during the 30's and a soldier during...
body:
Peter Parker, a Gen Z kid, screws up: Fuck, guess I’ll kill myself.

Steve Rogers, an artist during the 30’s and a soldier during WWII who knows full well what Dadaism and fatalistic humor are: There’s bleach under the sink–

Bucky Barnes, the guy who listened to Steve’s art rants in the 30’s, watched his back in WWII and went through 70+ years of shit: –And a rope in the supply closet if you want options.

Rest of the Avengers: ?????!!!!!!!?????

summary: The Captain America Movies As Described By My Friend, Who Has Seen Them Only Once:
title: The Captain America Movies As Described By My Friend, Who Has Seen Them Only Once:
body:
My best friend, the inimitable @meaninginthetrees, is many wonderful things, but knowledgeable about the MCU is not one of those things. We got on the topic of Captain America tonight, and they decided to describe the movies as they remembered them. Once I realized how amazingly terrible their recollection of the movies was, I had to write down what they said. So I give you, The Captain America Movies As Described By Someone Who Has Only Seem Them Once.


The first one has the forties. He goes into the tank a weak man, he comes out a very strong man, so he’s able to enter the war. And there was also Bucky? I don’t remember. There was also maybe a woman that Captain America was into?

The second one, he ran a lot of laps around a black guy – he kept saying “on your left!” Other than that, explosions. A lot of explosions. An aircraft? Of some kind? There was Bucky, who was the Winter Soldier, I don’t know why. He had at least one metal arm, maybe two? Did the arm have a gun on it? Maybe a knife? …or was it just a really strong metal arm? I feel like I remember people shooting at the Winter Soldier and he didn’t die? Bucky was against Captain America at least most of this movie – again, I don’t know why. I remember thinking he was really cool. I know his name is Bucky! All I remember is that the woman from the first one is now old, but he still loved her, and she was in the Agents of Shield show? I feel like I’ve heard in the show that she’s done some badass things.

I’ve seen another movie with Captain America in it and all I can describe it as is superhero tornado. They were in a stone room, and they were jumping around – the twins! One is fast and one is weird, I remember that. Also like some part of a city broke off the earth??? May have landed? I assume it landed, it’s earth, there’s gravity, I assume it landed and killed millions of people.

blog.name: mxrvel-imxgines-blog
blog.title: Well Imagine That
blog.description:
taking requests for any marvel character! hmu sometime, I love getting messages and talking to y’all

-also known as Delmar on Quotev- Masterlist

summary: Killer Queen
body:
Killer Queen

Loki x reader

request: EVEN BETTER: karaoke night with the avengers n reader sings killer queen by queen to loki n everyone just like- teases him for it IDK i just love karaoke night, queen, and loki so ya

warnings: none

“No.” Loki glared up at the flashing neon lights in disgust, crossing his arms tightly over his chest. “I am too dignified to enter such a place.”

“Oh come on now, brother, it’s not so bad,” Thor slapped him forcefully on the shoulder, leading him into the bar.

“And I take it you’ve been here before?” Loki rolled his eyes when Thor smiled at him and nodded. Loki bit his tongue and only glared at his brother, the thought of stabbing him crossing his mind however dismissing it when you clasped onto his hand, smiling up at him.

“Yeah c’mon, loosen up a little! It’s super fun.”

Loki raised an brow amusingly at your excitement as you pulled him towards the table reserved just for your group; the rest of the Avengers were already there and waiting, drinks in hand. Tony and Clint were already drunk, and judging by Natasha’s laughter, had already been up on stage.

He begrudgingly sat down, his lips forming a narrow line. He couldn’t help though but admire your cheerful expression as you went around and greeted the rest of the team. How you could be so happy all of the time astounded him, especially being on a team where threats and danger were eminent. He admired that the most about you.

He had met you a few years back when he had first tried to dominate Midgard; even though you were a normal human assassin, you had dared to defy him, and you had actually put up a decent fight that quite impressed him.

“Loki…?” He shook himself from his thoughts and looked up at you, your eyes sparkling. “Are you coming or are you staying here?”

“I would rather not embarrass myself.” He stated stiffly, looking away.

“Oh please,” You laughed, and made your way to the stage.

Loki watched curiously as you jumped up on to the stage and actually started singing. He didn’t realize how wonderful your voice actually was, even though it was to some Midgardian song.

“…Recommended at the price. Insatiable an appetite. Wanna try?…”

You winked as you confidently belted out the lyrics, and Loki could’ve sworn it was at him. He flushed a little, trying to determine if you were singing at him in particular or just in general. And then the thought crossed his mind - Did you like him?

You’d always been pretty touchy-feely with him and you’d constantly seek him out to talk to and hang out with, sometimes making inappropriate innuendos that he wouldn’t quite get until the next day.

And then, with a soft fluttery feeling in his chest, he realized that he in fact does like you.

“…Temporarily out of gas. To absolutely drive you wild, wild. She’s all out to get you…”

“She’s looking straight at you, brother,” Thor nudged him, nearly knocking him over. He straightened himself out and huffed embarrassedly. “Finally, a woman that can actually stand you!”

“Shut up, you blabbering idiot, before she notices.”

But it was true. Your eyes had been boring into his for the majority of the song, staring as if you were looking for something incredibly important.

You finished your song, your face flushed from the bright stage lights and sat down next to him, offering a tired sheepish laugh. “If you guys want me to go back up there, you’re going to have to buy me a few drinks.”

Loki smirked and twirled his fingers and all of the sudden a glass appeared on the table in front of you, startling you.

You playfully narrowed your eyes at him, taking ahold of the glass and taking a sip. “Did you like my singing?”

“Well, of course. A beautiful woman like yourself gifted with such a talented voice is pleasurable to listen to.” He waved nonchalantly, watching as your face blushed a deeper hue. You then smiled at him.

“Well, thank you, I did it just for you.” You then stood and made your way through the crowd towards the bathroom.

“She liKES YOU.”

“SHUT IT THOR.”

———

Permanent Tag List: @laurfangirl424 @sighspidey @mylovefortomholland

He had met you a few years back when he had first tried to dominate Midgard; even though you were a normal human assassin, you had dared to defy him, and you had actually put up a decent fight that quite impressed him.

“Loki…?” He shook himself from his thoughts and looked up at you, your eyes sparkling. “Are you coming or are you staying here?”

“I would rather not embarrass myself.” He stated stiffly, looking away.

“Oh please,” You laughed, and made your way to the stage.

Loki watched curiously as you jumped up on to the stage and actually started singing. He didn’t realize how wonderful your voice actually was, even though it was to some Midgardian song.

“…Recommended at the price. Insatiable an appetite. Wanna try?…”

You winked as you confidently belted out the lyrics, and Loki could’ve sworn it was at him. He flushed a little, trying to determine if you were singing at him in particular or just in general. And then the thought crossed his mind - Did you like him?

You’d always been pretty touchy-feely with him and you’d constantly seek him out to talk to and hang out with, sometimes making inappropriate innuendos that he wouldn’t quite get until the next day.

And then, with a soft fluttery feeling in his chest, he realized that he in fact does like you.

“…Temporarily out of gas. To absolutely drive you wild, wild. She’s all out to get you…”

“She’s looking straight at you, brother,” Thor nudged him, nearly knocking him over. He straightened himself out and huffed embarrassedly. “Finally, a woman that can actually stand you!”

“Shut up, you blabbering idiot, before she notices.”

But it was true. Your eyes had been boring into his for the majority of the song, staring as if you were looking for something incredibly important.

You finished your song, your face flushed from the bright stage lights and sat down next to him, offering a tired sheepish laugh. “If you guys want me to go back up there, you’re going to have to buy me a few drinks.”

Loki smirked and twirled his fingers and all of the sudden a glass appeared on the table in front of you, startling you.

You playfully narrowed your eyes at him, taking ahold of the glass and taking a sip. “Did you like my singing?”

“Well, of course. A beautiful woman like yourself gifted with such a talented voice is pleasurable to listen to.” He waved nonchalantly, watching as your face blushed a deeper hue. You then smiled at him.

“Well, thank you, I did it just for you.” You then stood and made your way through the crowd towards the bathroom.

“She liKES YOU.”

“SHUT IT THOR.”

———

Permanent Tag List: @laurfangirl424 @sighspidey @mylovefortomholland

trail.content_raw:
Killer Queen

Loki x reader

request: EVEN BETTER: karaoke night with the avengers n reader sings killer queen by queen to loki n everyone just like- teases him for it IDK i just love karaoke night, queen, and loki so ya

warnings: none

“No.” Loki glared up at the flashing neon lights in disgust, crossing his arms tightly over his chest. “I am too dignified to enter such a place.”

“Oh come on now, brother, it’s not so bad,” Thor slapped him forcefully on the shoulder, leading him into the bar.

“And I take it you’ve been here before?” Loki rolled his eyes when Thor smiled at him and nodded. Loki bit his tongue and only glared at his brother, the thought of stabbing him crossing his mind however dismissing it when you clasped onto his hand, smiling up at him.

“Yeah c’mon, loosen up a little! It’s super fun.”

Loki raised an brow amusingly at your excitement as you pulled him towards the table reserved just for your group; the rest of the Avengers were already there and waiting, drinks in hand. Tony and Clint were already drunk, and judging by Natasha’s laughter, had already been up on stage.

He begrudgingly sat down, his lips forming a narrow line. He couldn’t help though but admire your cheerful expression as you went around and greeted the rest of the team. How you could be so happy all of the time astounded him, especially being on a team where threats and danger were eminent. He admired that the most about you.

He had met you a few years back when he had first tried to dominate Midgard; even though you were a normal human assassin, you had dared to defy him, and you had actually put up a decent fight that quite impressed him.

“I would rather not embarrass myself.” He stated stiffly, looking away.

And then, with a soft fluttery feeling in his chest, he realized that he in fact does like you.

“She’s looking straight at you, brother,” Thor nudged him, nearly knocking him over. He straightened himself out and huffed embarrassedly. “Finally, a woman that can actually stand you!”

“Shut up, you blabbering idiot, before she notices.”

But it was true. Your eyes had been boring into his for the majority of the song, staring as if you were looking for something incredibly important.

You finished your song, your face flushed from the bright stage lights and sat down next to him, offering a tired sheepish laugh. “If you guys want me to go back up there, you’re going to have to buy me a few drinks.”

Loki smirked and twirled his fingers and all of the sudden a glass appeared on the table in front of you, startling you.

You playfully narrowed your eyes at him, taking ahold of the glass and taking a sip. “Did you like my singing?”

“Well, of course. A beautiful woman like yourself gifted with such a talented voice is pleasurable to listen to.” He waved nonchalantly, watching as your face blushed a deeper hue. You then smiled at him.

“Well, thank you, I did it just for you.” You then stood and made your way through the crowd towards the bathroom.

“She liKES YOU.”

“SHUT IT THOR.”

blog.description:
KAY // the RDJ spectrum

"You are our captor, but you feed us, so we'll tolerate you." — Robert Downey Jr.'s alpacas, referring to RDJ, according to RDJ.

tags: three websites so the servers don't get all crazy if too many people are watching at the same time
obvi the whole thanos and end of the universe thing is really difficult for him to live through again
and he doesn't actually have a lot of footage from that
what with the team being split apart and him being in space and dying and all
but he does have footage of the aftermath when the team is reunited and they're working together again
most of that episode is just everyone talking about their experience in the interviews
it's the saddest episode of the series
but then the next one is about them officially being a team again so yay!
and there's a wedding episode obvs
summary: various editors regularly approach Tony Stark with book deals to write and publish his autobiography. but instead of writing a...
body:
various editors regularly approach Tony Stark with book deals to write and publish his autobiography.

but instead of writing a memoir, after Tony retires, he produces his own documentary series. he interviews all his teammates and does his own confessionals; uses cell phone vids from everyone, the video diaries that he records with Dum-E and U, and footage from his homes and armors that JARVIS, FRIDAY, and his HUD gathers over his years as Iron Man and an Avenger; selects the important moments to highlight (like the super important and big battles, and when the team is training together, or bonding over dinner and movies, etc.); and works with Peter to edit everything and put together all the videos.

he doesn’t do any press for this, doesn’t go on any talk shows or appear in magazines to promote the series. he just publishes the entire series on the Avengers, SI, and Maria Stark Foundation websites so people worldwide can watch it for free and without any ads interrupting them. then he only announces it on social media to let people know it’s available online.
